content: --- title: Flight Plan Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-08-15T06:32:37.923Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:34:18.983Z --- # Flight Plan Info Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :----------------------------------------------------------| | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier. | | efbAcRegNo | `'string'` | Aircraft registration number recorded in EFB for the flight. | | dispatcher | `'string'` | Dispatcher's name and surname of the flight. | | ofpNumber | `'string'` | Identification number of the Operational Flight Plan for a specific leg. | | flightTime | `'duration'` | Flight time of the leg, in hours and minutes (hh:mm) format. | | blockTime | `'duration'` | Block time of the leg, in hours and minutes (hh:mm:ss) format. | | efbEstimatedTakeOffTime | `'datetime'` | Recorded Estimated Departure Time in EFB, in UTC. | | taxiInTime | `'duration'` | Duration spent taxiing from the runway to the gate after landing, in hours, minutes, and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format. | taxiOutTime | `'duration'` | Duration spent taxiing from the gate to the runway before take-off, in hours, minutes, and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format. | flightPlanRoute | `'string'` | Airway route defined by waypoints between takeoff and landing locations. | | flightInformationRegion | `'string'` | Entry and exit points for countries based on airspace boundaries. | | flightAtcPlan | `'string'` | Approved flight plan message of Air Traffic Control.| | dispatchRemark | `'string'` | Specific notes or instructions provided by dispatchers to flight crews before departure. | | averageWindComponent | `'string'` | Average headwind or tailwind speed information along the route. '-' indicates headwind, '+' indicates tailwind and the number represents the wind speed, in knots. | | sid | `'string'` | Standard Instrument Departure procedure that ensures aircraft are separated from other traffic safely and efficiently after takeoff from
